title: Washington Firm Recalls Beef Jerky Products That May Be Undercooked
summary: WASHINGTON, May 7, 2016 4 Frendz, LLC., a Clarkston, Wash. establishment, is recalling approximately 497 pounds of beef jerky products due to under-processing and potential survival of bacterial pathogens in the products, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today.The...
